archimate:Goal.name: Identify scope and motivation behind ISAE 3402 audit
archimate:Goal.documentation: Properly Determine Scope Why are we doing this audit for group? It has an associated cost and workload. Who deemed it essential for customers and their auditors? If we have to do this for group which customers/industries have made it necessary? Given that the processes that are in scope are so comprehensive could we create a security zone around these, so our entire environment is not subject to audit? e.g. if this audit requirement originated from exEVRY is it possible we could limit the scope of control for access management to COS/IDAR?
